bug.author: gmuraru
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Currently, we support only SMPC for <= 2 parties. We would like to support parties. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/PySyft/pull/3909>this</denchmark-link> for more details. <denchmark-h:h2>Acceptance Criteria</denchmark-h>
Add tests where we have multiple workers

comments.comment: This issue has been marked stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Leave a comment or remove the stale label to unmark it. Otherwise, this will be closed in 7 days.
